trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around May 31st 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from work. There was a traffic jam on the highway way out in the suburbs approx. 20 miles from Philadelphia. My friend and I were sitting there when I mentioned to him that I had seen a TV show about UFO's the night before. He laugh and said that stuff is all bull.I mentioned that I believed in UFO's. And at that time I looked up in the sky and said you see that shiny object above us, that could be a UFOright there, he laugh. I told him to look, he refused. I looked again, thinking it was just a helicopter reporting the traffic jam. So I told to look again, he refused. I looked again while it was just sitting there. It hadn't moved. I begged him to just take a look again he refused .So I looked once more and it took off at a incredible speed and dissapered. I was in the 101st Airborne and flew in choppers all the time. I know for a fact that a helicopter does not move at such extreme speeds.At that time I had no idea what that object could have been. The object was silver and round and had no markings on it at all.
Summary: A silver object in the sky above.
